sections.name: disease_overview
sections.description: Provide a concise overview of Alzheimer's disease with focus on diagnosis and screening.
key_questions: How is Alzheimer's disease diagnosed, and what are the commonly used screening procedures and tests?
sections.scope: Focus on diagnostic criteria and screening procedures.

sections.name: clinical_trials_analysis
sections.description: Identify clinical trials of IL-2 or Aldesleukin in Alzheimer's disease.
key_questions: What completed clinical trials have evaluated IL-2 in Alzheimer's disease?
